alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 2:53AM MST until February 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the mountains and 2 to 5 inches in Zion National Park. * WHERE...Southern Mountains and Zion National Park. * WHEN...From 5 PM today to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. For those planning outdoor activities, plan on wintry conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy snow overnight, likely exceeding one inch per hour rates, accompanied by gusty southerly winds up to 35 mph.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
